entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
